extendedInfo.description: Drive carefully, and once speedy, "Speedy! Watch out" will notify you with the speed limit of the road you are in. It will tell you the chance of getting a speed ticket based on your driving history in the current road. Its database is user-generated, you can add, verify, and report speeds and Arabic names for the roads (they are originally in English only)."Speedy! Watch out" uses internet and GPS to locate your car in real-time and tells you the speed limit associated with the current road you are driving in. It records your driving history, provides you with statistics, and tells you the chances of getting a speed ticket in current road based on your average speed in this road (The app is in beta, and it only supports Riyadh-Saudi Arabia city roads in terms of specifying speed limits for each road in the app database). "Speedy! Watch out" is collaborative.. you can verify road speeds, define new, and report false ones. You can modify roads to add Arabic names to them, and publish it in our databases. You may update your app database at anytime."Speedy! Watch out" supports Android 1.5+.**Phone Calls (read phones state and identity)permission is required to allow the app to work on Android 1.5+ÙØ¯ Ø¨Ø­Ø°Ø±Ø ÙØ¹ÙØ¯ÙØ§ ØªØ³Ø±Ø¹Ø Ø³ÙÙÙÙ "Ø­Ø§Ø°Ø±" Ø¨ØªÙØ¨ÙÙÙ Ø¨Ø£Ù Ø­Ø¯ Ø§ÙØ³Ø±Ø¹Ø© ÙÙØ°Ø§ Ø§ÙØ´Ø§Ø±Ø¹ ÙØ¯ ØªÙ ØªØ¬Ø§ÙØ²Ù. reviews.comment: Useless in South Dakota. No street speed limit data. Obviously not his Target audience. Installed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Said i was going 85mph when i was only going 40. Asked me to share info about the street i was on but it would not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The application idea is very good, but sometimes when o am at complete stop, not moving, my speed in the application changes and it reaches 10 km
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Annoyed me with non stop siren noises and had to force close...don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User
